Text:
What in the world is a BivX format?
lol.... surely you must mean DivX...
Also, you noted FR-ENG... meaning that the film is both in French and English?
However, in your description, you mention French as the spoken language, and not subtitles...

Ă‡a te tenterais pas de corriger tes erreurs/contradictions?

Thanks

bivx means you can choose between 2 languages.
in this case french or english..
